MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Mark(int32 readAheadLimit) cil managed
abstract member Mark : int -> unit override this.Mark : int -> unit

Docs.param: Limit on the number of characters that may be read while still preserving the mark. After reading this many characters, attempting to reset the stream may fail.
Docs.summary: Marks the present position in the stream.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while setting a mark in this reader.

Docs.summary: Tells whether this stream supports the mark() operation.

Docs.returns: The character read, as an integer in the range 0 to 65535 (0x00-0xffff), or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached

Docs.exception: if this reader is closed or some other I/O error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Ready() cil managed
abstract member Ready : unit -> bool override this.Ready : unit -> bool

Docs.summary: Tells whether this stream is ready to be read.
Docs.returns: True if the next read() is guaranteed not to block for input, false otherwise. Note that returning false does not guarantee that the next read will block.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if this reader is closed or some other I/O error occurs.
